title: White Castle Opens
description: The first fast-food chain in America starts serving small, square burgers.

title: McDonald's Founded
description: Dick and Mac McDonald open the first McDonald's restaurant in San Bernardino, California.

title: Invention of the Big Mac
description: McDonald's introduces the Big Mac, becoming an iconic menu item.

title: First Happy Meal
description: McDonald's launches the Happy Meal aimed at kids, with toys included.

title: Taco Bell Founded
description: Glen Bell opens the first Taco Bell in Downey, California.

title: Doritos Locos Taco Launches
description: Taco Bell releases the Doritos Locos Taco, blending snack food and fast food.

title: KFC's Original Recipe Introduced
description: Colonel Sanders perfects his secret blend of 11 herbs and spices.

title: Wendy's Founded
description: Dave Thomas opens the first Wendy's in Columbus, Ohio.

title: Plant-Based Whopper Debuts
description: Burger King introduces the Impossible Whopper, a plant-based alternative.

title: First Drive-Thru Opens
description: In-N-Out Burger establishes the first drive-thru restaurant.
